replies.body:
UPDATE: 

It looks like my colleague, Bark Wahlberg, is asking for some information to further investigate this issue. If you're connecting through Comcast and experiencing this issue, please visit this thread and post the information he's requesting:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/R9W03baQ-dc-cant-reconnect-cant-login?comment=0029

Thank you.

Original: 

Hey everyone, sorry to the disruption. We've noticed some connection issues with players connecting through Comcast--it doesn't seem to be isolated to any particular area. Do you all happen to connect from Comcast? If so, my colleagues are currently investigating it; keep an eye out on the Server Status page here: 

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na

For those who aren't connecting through Comcast, but you're experiencing frequent disconnections and not being able to log in, hit us up on the Support Site since the two issues may be unrelated to the incident posted on the Server Status page: 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Server still shows up as online, but I cant connect to my game, my buddy about 14 hours away from me is logged in.... so i have no idea whats going on... maybe its just east coast getting screwed over?
Its more than just the East coast, im in Cali and cant login either
Some people are saying it's something to do with Comcast, I was in the middle of a game and then got disconnected, and haven't been able to reconnect for over an hour now.

I have work soon and would like to get a League game before I go as I'll be gone all night.
Rip free time.
i try to recover,change password,used another computer and try to fix it manually on cmd but doesnt work
